title: the rise
author: the rise
created_time: October 23, 2023, 02:40:43 PMLast edit: November 23, 2023, 07:46:19 PM by the rise
content: Because we didn't get the target number of participants we decided to cut the allocation by 50% for the bounty campaign,we place allocations to Airdrop campaignsjoin here: https://twitter.com/CMBMservice/status/1727770907081642320 Format for proof of authentication post: Code:Proof of authentication:- Forum Username:- Wallet address:- Twitter Profile- Discord Username:- Telegram Username: Allocation $5K of SPAYDuration 5 weekWeek 1 : 10/11 - 16/11Week 2 : 17/11 - 23/11Week 3 : 24/11 - 30/11Rewards:- Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week- Have more than 2500 followers: 2 stakes/week- Have more than 5001 followers: 5 stakes/week- Have more than 10,001 followers: 10 stakes/week Rules:  - Every participant must follow the script network twitter Page- Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit)- Twitter account must have a minimum of 500 followers- must join telegram and discord, if you don't join you will not receive stake- You must make minimum of 5 retweets & 2 tweets per week. Mention script network Project, Be sure to include following hashtag  #blockchain #scripttv #freetv  #blockchaintv #earnbywatching #NFTs  #StreamingServices #ScriptTV- Every retweet must be likedReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Twitter Profile Link:Week 1Retweet Link 1Retweet Link 2Retweet Link 3Retweet Link 4Retweet Link 5Week 1Tweet Link 1Tweet Link 2...Please make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post.RULES- All participants must join the official channel.https://discord.com/invite/scriptnetwork- must join telegram and discord - You are required to submit at least 3 message/week on Discord- Use your referral link to invite members weekly to get more stakesEngage in conversation weeklyREWARDSno invite 1stake/week 5-49 invites 3 stake/week50-100 invites 6 stakes/week51-149 invites 9 stakes/ week200+ invites 12 stakes/weekReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Discord username:Week 1how many are invited ?- link message 1- link message 2- link message 3noteif you don't invite anyone, you don't have to fill out the weekly reportPlease make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post.
